info.name: Astral, Chat, delayed dice menu
info.description: Modifies: Delayed dice menus in the in-game chat. Shrinks the long formula into a "click" button, enables Actions to be menus of die rolls by skill or attribute
info.additionalInfo:
Two steps to make this work:

1. Because the chat window is in an iframe, you will need to turn on Advanced mode in the Stylus Preferences. 

2. Be sure that you set "Applies to URLs starting with" to https://app.astraltabletop.com/widget/game
